name: LU Decomposition
description:
[LU Decomposition](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LU_decomposition) is a numerical technique used to factor a matrix into the product of lower and upper [triangular matrices](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triangular_matrix).

Given a matrix **A** in the form of a 2D array (e.g. **[[1, 2], [3, 4]]**), return an object with two properties: **l** and **u**, where:

- l is a lower triangular triangular matrix
- u is an upper triangular matrix
- LU = A

Assume the given matrix is square and non-empty.

The efficiency of your algorithm should be considered.

Note: there can be more than one possible LU pair for a given matrix.
